tit.j: 宇治市源氏物語ミュージアム
tit.e: Uji City Tale of Genji Museum
Uji City Tale of Genji Museum
Uji City Tale of Genji Museum

sen.j: 宇治市源氏物語ミュージアム（うじしげんじものがたり‐）は、京都府宇治市にある「源氏物語」に関する資料の収集・保管等を行う市立の博物館である。
sen.e: The Uji City Tale of Genji Museum (Uji-shi Monogatari Museum) in Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture is a museum run by Uji City in order to collect and preserve materials related to the Tale of Genji.
The Uji City Tale of Genji Museum (Uji-shi Monogatari Museum) in Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture is a museum run by Uji City in order to collect and preserve materials related to the Tale of Genji.
The Uji City Tale of Genji Museum in Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture is a museum run by Uji City in order to collect and preserve materials related to the 'Genji Monogatari' (Tale of Genji).

sen.j: また、開館10周年にあたる2008年9月にリニューアルが行われた。
sen.e: It was refurbished in September 2008 on its tenth anniversary.
It was refurbished in September 2008 on its tenth anniversary.
It was refurbished in September 2008 on its tenth anniversary.

sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 所在地京都府宇治市宇治東内45番地26
sen.e: Address: 45-26 Ujihigashiuchi, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture
Address: 45-26 Ujihigashiuchi, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture
Address: 45-26 Ujihigashiuchi, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture

sen.j: 休館日原則として毎週月曜日、12月28日〜翌年1月3日
sen.e: Closed: Usually every Monday, 28 December to 03 January
Closed: Usually every Monday, 28 December to 03 January
Closed: Usually every Monday, December 28 to January 3

sen.j: 大人（15歳以上） 1人一回500円（30人以上の団体400円）
sen.e: Adult (over 15 years old): 500 yen (400 yen/person for groups of over 30 people)
Adult (over 15 years old): 500 yen (400 yen/person for groups of over 30 people)
Adult (over 15 years old): 500 yen (400 yen per person for groups of over 30 people)

sen.j: 小人（小学生・中学生） 1人一回250円（30人以上の団体200円）
sen.e: Child (Elementary School, Junior High School students): 250 yen (200 yen/person for groups of over 30 people)
Child (Elementary School, Junior High School students): 250 yen (200 yen/person for groups of over 30 people)
Child (Elementary School, Junior High School students): 250 yen (200 yen per person for groups of over 30 people)

sen.j: 普通自動車：1台30分間につき100円
大型自動車：1台1回につき2000円
